home.desc: Specialized in building responsive, and user-focused web applications.

project.desc: Entry Data android APP for residents houses with React Native (FrontEnd), Node.js + Express (Backend), dan MongoDB (Database)
project.desc2: Company profile website for Bukit Tangkeban tourism built with Laravel, MySQL and Node.js

rusdaca.desc1: The mobile application of RUSDACA App is designed for end-users to manage resident's house data.
rusdaca.desc2: The website admin of RUSDACA App is designed for admin to manage resident's house and their data.
rusdaca.desc3: The REST API of RUSDACA App provides server endpoints to manage resident and house data efficiently.
